seo.title: SignUp
seo.description: Sign up for a free account to get started with programming with 4Geeks

your-address: Give us your address to find your new class
addres-info: We are not storing your address, but we will use this information to offer the best possible dates and schedules to study.
email-info: We will use it to give you access to your account.
phone-info: We will contact you via phone call only if necessary. (optional)
already-adquired-plan-description: You've had already acquired this plan before, you can't buy it again. Click below to see your subscriptions.

info.will-pay-monthly: You will pay ${{price}} dollars {{qty_months}} times, for a total of ${{total_amount}}. The first payment will be today and the next one on {{next_month}}.
info.will-pay-month: You will pay ${{price}} dollars {{qty_months}} times, for a total of ${{total_amount}}.
info.will-pay-now: You will pay ${{price} right now, no other charges apply in the future.
info.will-pay-per-month: You will subscribe and pay ${{price}} dollars every month
info.will-pay-per-year: You will subscribe and pay ${{price}} dollars every year

validators.invalid-phone: Please specify a valid phone number

no-date-available: We currently have no dates available for the location entered

alert-message.title: Already have an account?
alert-message.message1: It seems that you already have an account, please check your email inbox for any messages from
alert-message.message3: forgot password to get a new one
